meanings.definition: To summarize or condense into a concise form.
meanings.sent1: She capsulized the entire story in just a few sentences.
meanings.sent2: I always capsulize my notes before exams to study efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The teacher capsulized the lesson so well that everyone understood.
meanings.sent4: His speech capsulized the key points, leaving a lasting impact on the audience.
meanings.sent5: Capsulizing information helps in better retention and understanding.

meanings.definition: Enclosed in a capsule or similar structure.
meanings.sent1: The capsulized medicine was easy to swallow.
meanings.sent2: The tiny capsules contained the capsulized nutrients.
meanings.sent3: She found the capsulized jewelry box adorable.
meanings.sent4: The capsulized seeds were ready to be planted in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The capsulized vitamins provided a convenient way to stay healthy.
